data.title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Music

data.text:
This article details the list of music associated with the Katekyo Hitman Reborn! series. Music is largely connected to the anime of which there was able to be multiple opening and ending songs included for the various seasons. Involved with the manga as well, music is also concerned with the character experiences there and across the series as there are character related songs featured too.

Opening Themes[]

# Title Artist Episode # 1 Drawing days Splay 1 - 26 2 BOYS & GIRLS LM.C 27 - 51 3 DIVE TO WORLD CHERRYBLOSSOM 52 - 73 4 88 LM.C 74 - 101 5 last cross Masami Mitsuoka 102 - 126 6 EASY GO Kazuki Kato 127 - 153 7 Funny Sunny Day SxOxU 154 - 177 8 LISTEN TO THE STEREO!! Going Under Ground 178 - 203

Ending Themes[]

# Title Artist Episode # 1 Michishirube Keita Tachibana 1 - 12 2 ONE NIGHT STAR The ARROWS 13 - 29 3 Echo again Splay 30 - 38 4 friend IDOLING!!! 39 - 51, 63 5 Sakura addiction Takashi Kondo & Toshinobu Iida 52 - 62 6 STAND UP! Lead 64 - 76 7 Ameato W-inds 77 - 89 8 CYCLE CHERRYBLOSSOM 90 - 101 9 Suberidai Mori Tsubasa 102 - 114 10 Sakura Rock CHERRYBLOSSOM 115 - 126 11 Smile for... Ueto Aya 127 - 139 12 Aoi Yume Mori Tsubasa 140 - 153 13 Yume no Manual CHERRYBLOSSOM 154 - 165 14 gr8 story SuG 166 - 177 15 Famiglia D-51 178 - 190 16 Canvas +Plus 191 - 203
